Reviews.Title: Fun Effect, But Not For Serious Use
Reviews.Author: C. Hill "CFH"
Reviews.Content: The Wide Angle Fish Eye Jelly Lens is a fun attachment for your small cell phone camera or pocket video camera (i.e. Creative VADO or Flip Ultra). It does significantly increase the field of vision of the existing lens, but the distortion is also significant. This is a fairly fun effect for the first few minutes and it might let you get a reference shot that would otherwise be missed, but doesn't really lend itself to much day to day practical use.The lens is attached to your camera via a sticky ring and it can be put on and taken off very quickly without leaving any residue. It is useful to have the camera on and view the placement on the LCD to make sure the lens is properly placed and not obscuring the existing lens.This might not be for everyone but it is small and fairly inexpensive so I carry it with my small camera just in case I ever find a use for it.

Reviews.Title: Jelly Lens for iPhone
Reviews.Author: JustAGirlNamedJess
Reviews.Content: You get what you pay for. It was cheap in price and was cheaply made. It is suppose to "stick on" over the camera hole. Which it does the first time then it loses the "sticky" and keeps falling off. It was only $5 or $6 and was fun while it lasted. As long as you know it is a "use it then toss it" gadget you will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Decent for playing around with
Reviews.Author: JR "JR"
Reviews.Content: Decent enough for playing around with and adding a bit of flare to your video but does blur the image at the outer most edges.

Reviews.Title: A fun toy
Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: This product is not for serious photographers trying to get the shot of their lives, but as a little novelty item, it's great.  I've definitely gotten my money's worth!  It works well with my iPhone, although I definitely agree with the other reviewers who say it could be stickier.

Reviews.Title: Meh...
Reviews.Author: Jesse
Reviews.Content: Looks like trash, and won't stick on after minimal usage. I wouldn't recommend this purchase.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: J. Kershaw
Reviews.Content: Not sure what I was expecting, but I bought the lens hoping to use it on my Kodak Zi8. The first thing I noticed was that all but the centre of the image is fuzzy. The second thing I noticed was that the sticky part of the lens only held it in place for a couple of mins before falling off, making it totally unsuitable for use. The glue's not even strong enough to hold the protective cap in place for more than a few mins.Pretty much worthless to me. Will only use if I need a specific wide angle shot and I can hold the lens in place.On the other hand, it was $3.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price.
Reviews.Author: UnTaiMaiShu
Reviews.Content: Great concept and it works.  Using the Jelly Wide Angel Jelly Lens along with a Kodak Zi6 and the LG Env2 camera phone.  The lenses of these two devices are small enough for the Jelly to fit over thus producing an adapter free picture.Haven't really tried recording anything worth while other than testing the product and it does the job it should. What do you expect for something less than few dollars?

Reviews.Title: Doesn't work
Reviews.Author: Maya Stebbins
Reviews.Content: Doesn't work at all. It looks like it might stick but it doesn't. I saw a lot of bad reviews but thought "well it's cheap so i might as well try" and it wasn't worth it. Even though it's cheap DO NOT waste your money on this!

Reviews.Title: Excellent service for a defective item
Reviews.Author: Zorbon "Zorbon"
Reviews.Content: I could not get the sticky part of this lens to stick to either my iPad or Nokia Lumia.  I cleaned the first with a clean microfiber cloth, no go.  I next tried isopropyl alcohol and distiller water, still no go.The excellent vendor credited me quickly and completely.  Fun idea, I hope it works for others.

Reviews.Title: Very Bad
Reviews.Author: Theresa Aluzzo
Reviews.Content: The lens did not even stay on for one picture. I either got lucky and could take one or I would have to hold it.

Reviews.Title: Terrible!
Reviews.Author: Bradley Agcaoili
Reviews.Content: The sticky jelly really isn't that sticky. Also the cover doesn't even stick on to the jelly. The lens also doesn't stick on to my phone that well. If you are planning on getting a fisheye lens for your phone I highly recommend getting the magnetic fisheye lens. They work way better then the Jelly Lens.

Reviews.Title: Not worth the 2 bucks...
Reviews.Author: adam j manley
Reviews.Content: Bought these thinking they would at least stick to my camera long enough to take a pic...bah, I was wrong. Trying to center the lens is impossible too.

Reviews.Title: fell apart in minutes
Reviews.Author: GearGuy
Reviews.Content: Junk. Fell apart in minutes. Putting this infront of a camera lens makes the image blurry and fuzzy. Terrible optical quality.

Reviews.Title: Pretty much worthless
Reviews.Author: Pam Cur4ry
Reviews.Content: Product would not even stick to my phone for a few seconds...I will be tossing it in the trash today...best thing I can say for it is that it was only 4 bucks...

Reviews.Title: This is pretty cool, but...
Reviews.Author: Noms91
Reviews.Content: ...it doesn't come with several different sticky tabs, so when you put it on once, it sticks on, and then you lose a little bit of stickiness every time you put it on. Other than that, it does its job well for the price you pay.

Reviews.Title: Love Them
Reviews.Author: Linda A. Swetof
Reviews.Content: I purchased these for my kids and they love them.  They enjoy using them on their phones to make the pictures look different.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Chiara
Reviews.Content: It's good ;) but isn't suitable for professional photos, the quality is good but you see green edges all around the pic.

Reviews.Title: great for the price
Reviews.Author: Joe Joe.
Reviews.Content: just as described, a wide angle lend for your cell phone, i used it on my iphone 4 pictures came out cool.

Reviews.Title: Fast Ship and Inexpensive
Reviews.Author: Olga R.
Reviews.Content: My daughter wanted this lens for her phone.  It was delivered quickly.  She loves it.  I loved it because it wasn't very expensive.

Reviews.Title: Fun for my iphone
Reviews.Author: J. Gerarden "EuphPlayer"
Reviews.Content: Works GREAT with my hipstamatic app because it cuts the edges off. Fun for taking pictures of friends. Practical for taking pictures of architecture. Might replace my lomo camera?

Reviews.Title: It's okay
Reviews.Author: Carrie
Reviews.Content: Its cool, but there's little annoying things about. You get what you pay for in other words. If the light hits the lens in  certain way, the picture is covered with grey blurred light spots and you can see the green edges in the picture.I have the iPhone 4

Reviews.Title: low cost, works as claimed
Reviews.Author: D. Scott
Reviews.Content: I first learned of the "jelly lenses" in Japan during a recent trip. I bought 3 of these, 2 wide angle and one macro.I use one of the wide angle  ones on my webcam (without it I have to sit 3 ft from the camera to not fill the whole screen)On my Cell phone the macro lens is great, the wide angle helps , but not a lot. the one issue I have is they don't tend to stay on for very long. the problem is their  lanyard is heavy and pulls them off. ohterwise,a great product for the LOW price.

Reviews.Title: Fun Effect, But Not For Serious Use
Reviews.Author: C. Hill "CFH"
Reviews.Content: The Wide Angle Fish Eye Jelly Lens is a fun attachment for your small cell phone camera or pocket video camera (i.e. Creative VADO or Flip Ultra). It does significantly increase the field of vision of the existing lens, but the distortion is also significant. This is a fairly fun effect for the first few minutes and it might let you get a reference shot that would otherwise be missed, but doesn't really lend itself to much day to day practical use.The lens is attached to your camera via a sticky ring and it can be put on and taken off very quickly without leaving any residue. It is useful to have the camera on and view the placement on the LCD to make sure the lens is properly placed and not obscuring the existing lens.This might not be for everyone but it is small and fairly inexpensive so I carry it with my small camera just in case I ever find a use for it.

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: zswman
Reviews.Content: Do not buy.  Absolutely worthless, nothing but distortion, not even a toy.  In this case you really do get what you pay for

Reviews.Title: Junk!!! Like looking through toy plastic binoculars..
Reviews.Author: mxtime "mxtime"
Reviews.Content: Just like the title says... Don't waste the keystrokes and mouse clicks on buying this... Like trying to take a picture through a plastic mountain dew bottle..

Reviews.Title: Doesn't work
Reviews.Author: Jon
Reviews.Content: The product definitely arrived in a timely manner but does not do what it is intended for at all. Don't waste your money.

Reviews.Title: Not what was expected
Reviews.Author: dlemma
Reviews.Content: I ordered this product for my Toshiba camileo S20 handheld camcorder so I could have a fisheye lens for it. I received it fairly quickly,when I got it in I immediately placed it on the camera and the video was blurry.  I guess if I want a fisheye lens for my camera I will make one out of a peep hole. Until one is made for this camera.
